jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: Are you interested in building hyper-scale services in the cloud? At AWS, engineers get the chance to work on scalability solutions, large scale applications using Python, Java, TypeScript, and cloud platforms.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Join Tesla Autopilot team to develop real-time software systems for autonomous vehicles using React, Node.js, and computer vision technologies.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Build and maintain cloud infrastructure using Kubernetes, Docker, and Azure. Experience with CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code required.

resume_data.summary: Experienced software engineer with 5 years in full-stack development and cloud technologies
